name: Evelynn
title: Agony's Embrace
shortBio: Within the dark seams of Runeterra, the demon Evelynn searches for her next victim. She lures in prey with the voluptuous fa√ßade of a human female, but once a person succumbs to her charms, Evelynn's true form is unleashed. She then subjects her victim to unspeakable torment, gratifying herself with their pain. To the demon, these liaisons are innocent flings. To the rest of Runeterra, they are ghoulish tales of lust gone awry and horrific reminders of the cost of wanton desire.

skins.name: Blood Moon Evelynn
skins.description: A seductive demon summoned on the night of the Blood Moon, Evelynn moves between isolated villages, wooing the residents until they fall deeply in love with her. One by one these poor souls will surely perish, their hearts torn from their still-living bodies.

skins.name: K/DA Evelynn
skins.description: No one is as deliciously volatile as Evelynn. She's a diva who drives divisiveness in the media‚Äîthey love her one day and hate her the next, her name a permanent fixture of tabloid headlines. She is a born superstar, and the foundation of K/DA's sound.

skins.name: Prestige K/DA Evelynn
skins.description: With that wild in her veins, K/DA Evelynn stomps into the spotlight, shimmering in a custom golden outfit from the Pop Music Awards. Only 'winning, winning' now.

skins.name: Sugar Rush Evelynn

chromas.name: Sugar Rush Evelynn

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2019.

chromas.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2019.

chromas.name: Sugar Rush Evelynn

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a Loot exclusive in 2019.

chromas.description: This chroma was released as a Loot exclusive in 2019.

skins.description: In a world where every tooth is sweet, Evelynn's sugary bite is deadly.

skins.name: K/DA ALL OUT Evelynn

chromas.name: K/DA ALL OUT Evelynn

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2020.

chromas.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2020.

chromas.name: K/DA ALL OUT Evelynn

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a Loot exclusive in the 2020 Worlds event.

chromas.description: This chroma was released as a Loot exclusive in the 2020 Worlds event.

skins.description: With a single devastating glance, Evelynn can ensure that all eyes are on her‚Äîwhen she wants them to be. K/DA's success has ensured that this provocative diva's name will be on everyone's lips, but Evelynn is intent that her killer fashion sense will keep it there.

skins.name: Coven Evelynn

chromas.name: Coven Evelynn

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2021.

chromas.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2021.

chromas.name: Coven Evelynn

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a Loot exclusive in the 2021 Coven event.

chromas.description: This chroma was released as a Loot exclusive in the 2021 Coven event.

skins.description: The covens of the south join their sisters for the great resurrection, as old things stir once more, and old grudges are at last repaid in full. Evelynn, daughter of the Great Harrier, gladly joins her sisters for the darkness to come‚Äîa trail of brutality and death always in her wake.

skins.name: Prestige K/DA Evelynn (2022)
skins.description: With that wild in her veins, K/DA Evelynn stomps into the spotlight, shimmering in a custom golden outfit from the Pop Music Awards. Only 'winning, winning' now.

skins.name: Spirit Blossom Evelynn

chromas.name: Spirit Blossom Evelynn

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2022.

chromas.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2022.

chromas.name: Spirit Blossom Evelynn

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a Loot exclusive in the Worlds 2022 event.

chromas.description: This chroma was released as a Loot exclusive in the Worlds 2022 event.

skins.description: Come. Leave your flesh behind and pass into the Spirit World. Bring with you only your desires, your vices, your painful memories. Let the Spirit of Love feed on these unwanted temptations, for her hunger is ravenous. Evelynn will show you peace at last.

skins.name: Soul Fighter Evelynn

chromas.name: Soul Fighter Evelynn

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2023.

chromas.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2023.

chromas.name: Soul Fighter Evelynn

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a Loot exclusive in the 2023 Soul Fighter event.

chromas.description: This chroma was released as a Loot exclusive in the 2023 Soul Fighter event.

skins.description: Most awaken their souls through hard work, but this fighter... no! All it took was a stop by the Department for the Eradication of Manifested Anomalies and boom! Cobra powers. SURE, apparently the procedure involves the "worst pain one can possibly imagine." But look at her now! Here to hunt down a daughter with nowhere left to run... it's Evelynn!

skins.name: High Noon Evelynn

chromas.name: High Noon Evelynn

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2024.

chromas.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2024.

chromas.name: High Noon Evelynn

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a Loot exclusive in the 2024 High Noon event.

chromas.description: This chroma was released as a Loot exclusive in the 2024 High Noon event.

chromas.name: High Noon Evelynn

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a Loot exclusive in the 2024 High Noon event.

chromas.description: This chroma was released as a Loot exclusive in the 2024 High Noon event.

skins.description: The poor man looks haunted. Perfect. Evelynn leans over the bar top towards him with a sweet smile curling her red lips: ‚ÄúTell me your woes, handsome.‚Äù And he does. He tells her of his brother, and a raw deal, and how he thinks he might be dead now but ain't sure... and the devil drinks deep. ‚ÄúIt's alright, darlin',‚Äù she coos. ‚ÄúI've got you now.‚Äù

skins.name: Prestige High Noon Evelynn
skins.description: Ateliers near and far always ask Evelynn to wear their haute couture, but for this Gala, she's bringing her edgy elegance to a rowdier line of Western wear instead. What is fashion if not a wild new frontier? If there's anyone who knows how to take style by the reins and ride it into the sunset, it's this rodeo queen.

passive.name: Demon Shade
passive.description: When out of combat, Evelynn enters Demon Shade. Demon Shade heals Evelynn when she is low on health and grants Camouflage after level 6.

spells.name: Hate Spike
spells.description: Evelynn strikes out with her Lasher, dealing damage to the first unit hit. Then, Evelynn can shoot a line of spikes at nearby foes a few times.
spells.dynamicDescription:
Evelynn strikes with her Lasher, dealing @MissileDamage@ magic damage to the first enemy hit and causing Evelynn's next 3 Attacks or Abilities on that unit to deal an additional @TotalBonusDamage@ magic damage. Evelynn can Recast this Ability up to @QStackCount@ times.

Recast: Evelynn fires spikes through the nearest enemy, dealing @MissileDamage@ magic damage to all enemies hit.@SpellModifierDescriptionAppend@

spells.name: Allure
spells.description: Evelynn curses her target, causing her next attack or spell after a delay to charm her target and reduce their magic resist.
spells.dynamicDescription:
Evelynn marks a champion or monster for 5 seconds. If Evelynn hits the target with an Attack or Ability, she will expunge the mark, refund its cost, and Slow the target by @SlowAmount*100@% for @SlowDuration@ seconds.

If the mark lasts at least 2.5 seconds, expunging it has extra effects:
  • Against champions: Charms them for @CharmDuration@ second(s) and removes @MRShred*100@% Magic Resist for @ShredDuration@ seconds.
  • Against monsters: Charms them for @MonsterCharm@ seconds and deals @MonsterDamageTotalTOOLTIP@ magic damage.@SpellModifierDescriptionAppend@

spells.name: Whiplash
spells.description: Evelynn whips her target with her Lasher, dealing damage. She then gains Move Speed for a short duration.
spells.dynamicDescription:
Evelynn whips an enemy, dealing @BaseDamage@ plus @PercentHealthBaseTOOLTIP@ max Health magic damage. Evelynn gains @SpeedAmount*100@% Move Speed for @SpeedDuration@ seconds.

Entering Demon Shade refreshes this Ability's cooldown and empowers it. When this Ability is empowered, Evelynn dashes to the target and deals @EmpoweredDamage@ plus @PercentHealthEmpoweredTOOLTIP@ max Health magic damage to her target and everyone she passes through instead.@SpellModifierDescriptionAppend@

spells.name: Last Caress
spells.description: Evelynn briefly goes untargetable and decimates the area in front of her before warping backwards a long distance.
spells.dynamicDescription: Evelynn unleashes her demonic energy, dealing heavy damage, becoming Untargetable and teleporting backwards. She deals <magicDamage>@Damage@ magic damage</magicDamage>, increased to <magicDamage>@CritDamage@</magicDamage> against enemies below <healing>30% Health</healing>. Upon cast, set Demon Shade to a 1.25 second cooldown.@SpellModifierDescriptionAppend@
